name: Nostalgi14
author: Anubi
description:
(Probably)
 my final take on the Nostalgi palette series. 14 desaturated colors 
placed in 5 (6, if you count a different color a new) different ramps 
(gray, green/blue, red, brown, purple), with many of these colors being 
shared between ramps (most noticeably the dark purple/brown, which is 
shared between all ramps except gray!). Due to this, the connections of 
colors between ramps was improved in comparison with Nostalgi8, which 
should allow for smoother transitions between colors. An all-in-one 
palette for desaturated colors.
